name: Legend Of The Vampire Queen Ep 1 Killer Mannequins
name_original: Legend Of The Vampire Queen Ep 1 Killer Mannequins
description:
After The Great War With The Humans. The Vampire Queen (GamerVampires) and His Dog (Rocko) Awaken in a new world strange to them after coming from a portal. What awaits for them in this new world? Find Out What Happens.

There Are Two Endings in This Game.
This Is Our First Game
This Is Episode 1 Outta 10+ Episodes coming out

This Game Was Made on #RpgMakerVXAce
#LOTVQ
